scripts.deploy: tar -cvf ./deploy.tar ./dist && caprover deploy -t ./deploy.tar -n legio -a scraper && rm ./deploy.tar
scripts.deploy-qc: tar -cvf ./deploy.tar --exclude='node_modules' * && caprover deploy -t ./deploy.tar -n legio -a scraper-qc && rm ./deploy.tar
scripts.deploy-notify: rm -rf ./dist && bun run build && cp ./Dockerfile ./dist && cp ./captain-definition ./dist && tar --strip-components=2 -cvf ./deploy.tar --exclude='*.map' ./dist/* && caprover deploy -t ./deploy.tar -n notify -a legione-etruria-scraper && rm ./deploy.tar
